Time.strategy: Start with micro-habits that take less than 5 minutes
tips: Stack new habits onto existing routines
Use waiting time (coffee brewing, commute) productively
Wake up 15 minutes earlier for morning routine
Batch similar tasks together to save time

Energy.strategy: Match activities to your energy peaks and valleys
tips: Schedule demanding tasks during your high-energy hours
Start with the easiest version of your goal
Improve sleep quality firstâ€”it multiplies energy
Take strategic breaks to recharge throughout the day

Stress.strategy: Build stress management into your daily routine
tips: Practice 5-minute breathing exercises when stressed
Identify and address root causes, not just symptoms
Set boundaries to protect your wellbeing
Schedule regular breaks and recovery time

Motivation.strategy: Create systems that don't rely on motivation alone
tips: Make it easier to do the right thing (prep, environment)
Track progress visually to see momentum
Connect daily actions to your bigger 'why'
Celebrate small wins to build positive momentum

Clarity.strategy: Break down your vision into specific, actionable steps
tips: Define what success looks like for each week
Choose 1-2 focus areas instead of trying everything
Write down your plan and review it weekly
Ask for help or guidance when stuck

Environment.strategy: Design your environment to support healthy choices
tips: Remove temptations and add helpful cues
Prep healthy options in advance
Create a dedicated space for your health activities
Surround yourself with people who support your goals

Support.strategy: Build accountability and community around your goals
tips: Find an accountability partner or coach
Join a group or community with similar goals
Share your goals with supportive friends/family
Schedule regular check-ins to stay on track

Knowledge.strategy: Learn as you go, starting with the basics
tips: Focus on one skill or area at a time
Find a trusted resource or mentor
Practice consistently rather than seeking perfection
Ask questions and seek feedback regularly
